text: The University of Technology and Business (Universidad Tecnología y Empresa) was a private university in Madrid, Spain with campuses in both Madrid and Toledo.http://unitye.es/futuros- estudiantes.htmlhttps://www.educacion.gob.es/ruct/universidad.action?codigoUniversidad=078&actual;=centros , the university offered forty-six bachelor's degrees and, through the Leadership School of Thought graduate program, twenty-three master's degrees and five doctorates.http://srv.aneca.es/ListadoTitulos/search/site/Universidad%2520Tecnolog%25C3%25ADa%2520y%2520Empresa == History == The university originated in ETEA, the Faculty of Economic and Business Sciences of Córdoba, a higher education centre founded in 1963. The establishment of the Universidad Tecnología y Empresa was approved by the Parliament of Spain on 23 November 2009. The first promotion enrolled in 2009.https://www.educacion.gob.es/ruct/centro!historico.action?id=280517972009072301 ==References== Category:Defunct universities and colleges in Spain
title: University of Technology and Business
